alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Chouteau; Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 7:06PM MDT until July 09 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Judith Basin County in central Montana... Fergus County in central Montana... Southern Blaine County in north central Montana... Southeastern Chouteau County in north central Montana... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 706 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 21 miles south of St. Pierre to Stanford, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Stanford, Denton, Winifred, Grass Range, Hays, Roy, Fergus, Windham, Moccasin, Fred Robinson Bridge, Danvers, Coffee Creek, Suffolk, Giltedge, Judith Landing, Hilger, Christina, Iliad and Benchland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
